2064.subject: HPWE
2064.descrlong: Students complete a minimum of 80 hours of fieldwork in an agency approved by the Exercise Science faculty.  Approval is  based on the opportunities available for students to work on issues of importance in the exercise science areas, and the agency's ability to provide mentoring and organizational support for the student intern.  Check with the HPWE Department for further information. [Taken after completion of required courses in concentration].
